post.author: 왕성현
post.content:
Dear all,

I am 12years experienced  programmer currently working and living in Japan.
I am experienced in C/C++/C#/.Net/PHP/Flex-ActionScript, in Information Security,
TCP/IP Networking, GUI, Windows System Programming,  Linux Game Server,
Image processing, and etc.

I look forward to have an working opportunity in Canada, and want to find
a company which can sponsor me an Working Visa.

If you are interested, please send mail to 'brucewang.korea@gmail.com' and
I will send you my recent resume.

Best regards.,
post.title: 12years experienced programmer for hire. Visa sponsor wanted.
